directions: Mix grapes, tomatoes, red bell pepper, orange bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, edamame, and feta cheese with herbs in a bowl. Add basil, lemon pepper, and salt to vegetable-grape mixture; toss to coat. Add avocado and cashews to vegetable-grape mixture just before serving. Drizzle olive oil and vinegar over salad; toss to coat.
ingredients: 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese with herbs
1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, or to taste
title: Chopped Cashew Salad
